tool_description: Generates detailed daily schedules for technicians by combining job assignments, routes, time windows, and break requirements into executable timetables.

assigned_jobs.description: List of job IDs assigned to technician

job_durations.description: Service duration in minutes for each job

travel_times.description: Travel time to each job location in minutes

buffer_time.description: Buffer time between jobs in minutes

error_messages: Invalid shift times: shift_start must be before shift_end
Mismatched array lengths: assigned_jobs, job_durations, and travel_times must have equal length
Schedule overflow: Cannot fit all jobs within shift hours
Invalid break duration: Must be between 0 and 120 minutes
Invalid buffer time: Must be between 0 and 60 minutes
usage: Provide technician shift details, assigned jobs with durations and travel times to generate a complete daily schedule with proper timing and breaks.
